Package me.agno.gridjavacore.columns

Interface IColumnBuilder<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the grid class
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultColumnBuilder
public interface IColumnBuilder<T>
The IColumnBuilder interface provides methods for creating and configuring grid columns.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • isDefaultSortEnabled

      boolean isDefaultSortEnabled()
      Determines whether the default sort is enabled in the grid.
      Returns:
      true if the default sort is enabled, false otherwise

    • setDefaultSortEnabled

      void setDefaultSortEnabled(boolean defaultSortEnabled)
      Sets the default sort enabled flag for the grid.
      Parameters:
      defaultSortEnabled - the value to set for the default sort enabled flag

    • getDefaultGridSortMode

      GridSortMode getDefaultGridSortMode()
      Retrieves the default sort mode for the grid.
      Returns:
      the default sort mode for the grid

    • setDefaultGridSortMode

      void setDefaultGridSortMode(GridSortMode defaultGridSortMode)
      Sets the default sort mode for the grid.
      Parameters:
      defaultGridSortMode - the default sort mode to set for the grid

    • isDefaultFilteringEnabled

      boolean isDefaultFilteringEnabled()
      Determines whether the default filtering is enabled in the grid.
      Returns:
      true if default filtering is enabled, false otherwise

    • setDefaultFilteringEnabled

      void setDefaultFilteringEnabled(boolean defaultFilteringEnabled)
      Sets whether the default filtering is enabled in the grid.
      Parameters:
      defaultFilteringEnabled - true to enable the default filtering, false to disable it

    • createColumn

      <TData> IGridColumn<T> createColumn(String expression, Class<TData> targetType, boolean hidden)
      Creates a new grid column with the specified expression, target type, and hidden state.
      Type Parameters:
      TData - the type of the column's data
      Parameters:
      expression - the expression used to generate the column for the grid
      targetType - the class representing the target type of the column's data
      hidden - true if the column should be hidden, false otherwise
      Returns:
      the added grid column
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the targetType or expression is null
